cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on March 2, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6861, Reducing Costs of DHS Acquisitions Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 36 (Monday, February 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CLYDE:
H.R. 6861.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H1176]

latestAction.text: Subcommittee on Oversight, Management, and Accountability Discharged.

title: Reducing Costs of DHS Acquisitions Act
